title: Le Big Show
overview: From the Marigny Theater, Jarry will show all the colors to the spectators! Surprises, hidden cameras, moving reunions, games, dream gifts, unexpected happenings, surprise karaoke with our favorite stars: no one in the room is safe from the surprises and pitfalls of the Big Show! The Big Show is family entertainment that offers viewers an evening of humor and emotion with a multitude of funny and moving surprises!Â
